Product Description: OpenAI is an AI research and deployment company dedicated to ensuring that artificial general intelligence benefits all of humanity.
Anthropic is an AI safety company working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.
Perplexity AI is a search engine that uses AI to answer questions, cite sources, and provide comprehensive information.
Scale AI provides high-quality training data for AI applications, helping companies build and improve their machine learning models.
Suno is an AI music generation platform that allows users to create original songs with simple text prompts.
